mapper.select: SELECT t1.purchase_id as purchaseId, t1.reserve_no as reserveNo, t1.arrive_quantity as arriveQuantity, t1.surplus_quantity as surplusQuantity, t2.supplier_code as supplierCode, t2.`status`, t2.reserve_date as reserveDate, t2.time_window as timeWindow, t3.signin_date as signinDate FROM vr_supplier_porder t1 INNER JOIN vr_supplier_reserve t2 on t1.reserve_no = t2.reserve_no LEFT JOIN vr_driver_deliver t3 on t2.reserve_no = t3.reserve_no WHERE t1.purchase_id = #{purchaseId}
